title: Rug Dr. Clean Upholstery
description: Learn about our upholstery tool and how to use it.

asset.author: Rug Doctor LLC
asset.description: Learn about our upholstery tool and how to use it.

transcripts: Let's get started with the upholstery tool, To connect the upholstery tool to your rug doctor machine disconnect the black-and-gray vacuum hose then connect the grey cup of the upholstery tool. Next attach the solution line press up on the double brass ring to release the coupler then insert the brass nipple until it snaps into place, tug on it to be sure. Set the switch to upholstery then place the tool where you want to clean, squeeze the black trigger and pull back, you'll see dirty water coming up through the clear-site dome. The upholstery cleaner works on furniture, stairs, car mats and car seats be sure to clean your car mats on concrete like your driveway or patio.
